message.body: First day in a new apartment. MY STUFF IS EVERYWHERE - time to reassemble my domestic life...
No luckily just cross town. Im not complaining really, I actually like the chance to set up shop in a new way. What are you up to?
Working at a computer lab right now, about to go run some errands before working at the bar tonight
Sounds nice and varied - good balance youve got there.
Yeah definitely keeps me sane. I'm full time at the bar for the time being but I'm looking to split my time between the places more evenly
You can probably do it by becoming a thriftenheimer. NO MORE EATING OUT ITS NOT WORTH IT. Thats my technique when Im poor, at least.
Hahah yeah true. What do you do?
Im a video editor! Im poor generally when I take more satisfying creative work (music videos and such) and comfy when I take commercial work (sleazy casi
Haha are you in philly? A good friend of mine does the same thing and has the same woes
I AM in philly! Im Walker. Feel free to direct your friend to my production company's site: Revisionist.Co. I always heard this line of work would be lik
e this, but its an odd way to live at times.
He works with Backseat Conceptions. Careful with names, they don't want much personal info in the database
Good point - Ive always been a little flippant about personal info / security.
